casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Perrine, Appellant.
Submitted September 27, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
Joseph Paul Valentino, and Routman, Moore, Gold-stone & Valentino, for appellant.
Robert F. Banks, First Assistant District Attorney, and Joseph J. Nelson, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 20, 1971:
